EmailTemplate.description: Sent when IEP Model A Account Setup OSCAR is created
EmailTemplate.name: IEP Model A Creation
EmailTemplate.subject: Ref nr {!AMS_OSCAR__c.Name} â€“ Registration of IEP Account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sir/Madam,
Thank you for submitting your request to activate the IATA EasyPay form of payment for your agency.
Attached you can find all the information related to the IATA EasyPay payment method, including instructions on how to create an IATA EasyPay Account.
Should you require additional information, please reply to this e-mail. We will soon contact you with an update on your request.
Thanks in advance for your cooperation.
Kind Regards,
IATA Customer Service Portal
{!AMS_OSCAR__c.Emails_reference_Id__c}
https://portal.iata.org/faq/articles/en_US/FAQ/How-can-I-open-an-IATA-EasyPay-account/?l=en_US&c=FAQs%3AIATA_EasyPay&fs=Search&pn=1
